biblio-self-driving-cars

View the Project on GitHub maiminh1996/biblio-self-driving-cars

3D Object Detection/ Datasets

How to obtain 3D bounding box:

Ref Highlight description
KITTI (3D OD) CVPR 12 IJRR 13 ● Stereo (1224×368) + LiDAR 64 beams
● Real dataset: 7481 training (splitted as 3DOP NIPS 15 into 3712 training & 3769 validation) & 7518 test samples [Notes]
KITTI-Object-Depth (KOD) AAAI 20 Collect the corresponding gth depth map (11 frame) for each image in KITTI (3D OD) training set [Notes]
Virtual KITTI  
Weather augmented ICCV 19 ● Weather augmentation of Kitti & Cityscapes
● For each sequence, 7+ rain levels (from dizzle to storm conditions) & 7 fog intensities (from light to dense fog) [Notes]
Seeing Through Fog CVPR 20 ICCV 19 ● Stereo (1920x1024) + Gated cam + radar + LiDAR (HDL64 & VL32) + FIR cam
● Real dataset: rare scenarios (heavy fog, heavy snow & severe rain); 10000 km in northern Europe
●[Notes]
Canadian Adverse Driving Conditions arXiv 20 ● 56000 camera images, 7000 LiDAR sweeps,
● Real dataset: 75 scenes of 50-100 frames each
● Adverse weather driving conditions, including snow
Adverse Weather Dataset under review http://sar-lab.net/adverse-weather-dataset/

This project is maintained by maiminh1996
